\dA...ki... Akiii...\d%K%P
A gentle voice roused me from my slumber.%K%P
It felt as peaceful as if I were a baby in a\nrocker, and I craved more of it.%K%P
\dOh you...\d%K%P
As the rocking faded, something drew close to my\near.%K%P
\dAkira, wake up!\d *smooch*%K%P
\dBwha?!\d%K%P
Breath tickled my ear and something warm on my\ncheek pulled me out of my sleepy haze.%K%P
\dGood morning, Akira.\d%K%P
\dK-Kaede?\d%K%P
Right before my eyes stood Kaede, her nose to mine,\nher breath falling on my skin.%K%P
Her eyelashes were really quite long up close--\nWAIT! What?!%K%P
My head was spinning as I tried to put together\nwhat was going on, but she just laughed and pulled\naway.%K%P
\dMaybe that was too much? Sorry.\d%K%P
\dBut anyway, good morning.\d%K%P
\dG-Good morning, Kaede.\d%K%P
With a little space and my mind finally in the\nright place I saw what was going on.%K%P
\dSo uhh...you came to wake me up, huh? Did I\noversleep?\d%K%P
\dOh no, hardly. It's actually earlier than you'd\nnormally be up. I just wanted to see you.\d%K%P
\dI'll get your clothes ready. Just a moment.\d%K%P
\dYou really don't have to--\d%K%P
\dHere you are.\d%K%P
Whaa?!%K%P
She was back so fast it was like she had already\npicked everything out beforehand.%K%P
\dTh-Thanks...\d%K%P
I just took them without thinking.%K%P
It was probably best to happily accept the gesture\nwithout contemplating things too much.%K%P
\dSo uhh...Kaede?\d%K%P
\dWhatever do you need?\d%K%P
\dI kind of want to change, so...\d%K%P
\dI know. Oh wait...do you want me to dress you?\d%K%P
\dI suppose that is the job of any good wife now\nisn't it.\d%K%P
\dNo! I'll be out as soon as I'm ready, so could you\njust wait outside please?!\d%K%P
\dWha-- Wait! Akira!\d%K%P
I pushed her right out of the room and let out a\nsigh.%K%P
Something was different about her today...%K%P
\dMaybe she's still half asleep?\d%K%P
Even I didn't believe that was it.%K%P
Regardless, now that I was awake I had to take care\nof the morning chores.%K%P
Kaede though, she kept acting weird all through the\nmorning.%K%P
She followed me wherever I went, tried helping with\nwhatever I did, and just watched over me in\ngeneral.%K%P
My work here at the shrine was in reverence to the\ngods, so I declined all her offers of help. But as\na result she got even more touchy-feely.%K%P
\dWhat is going on here?\d%K%P
We'd kept each other at a distance for a while now,\nbut now all of a sudden she was on the attack.%K%P
\dBut...\d%K%P
The way she was acting now, trying to get my\nattention and all, it really reminded me of how she\nused to act before that day.%K%P
It all must have culminated in this behavior now.%K%P
Tossing aside any manly pride I might have had, I\nfigured this would be a good opportunity to make\nthings normal again.%K%P
\dHuh?\d%K%P
Finishing up my routine I headed in for some tea\nand found Kaede dozing off in a chair.%K%P
It was quite unlike her to take a nap in the middle\nof the day, especially anywhere but her own room.%K%P
\dI guess a lot has happened these past few days.\d%K%P
She was so soundly asleep I didn't dare wake her.%K%P
But she'd definitely get cold sleeping like that.%K%P
I grabbed a blanket from my room and drew close to\nwrap her in it.%K%P
\dMmm...\d%K%P
\dNghh...\d%K%P
As she stirred, her clothes slid down, revealing\neven more of her already eye-catching bust.%K%P
Her soft-looking skin and large perky breasts would\ndrive any man wild.%K%P
I had to get that blanket on her and get out fast.%K%P
But I couldn't. I stood staring just long enough\nfor her to wake up.%K%P
\dHmm...Akira?\d%K%P
Her eyes met mine.%K%P
Hers were still half shut, but she definitely saw\nme sneaking a peek.%K%P
\dOh, I... You see... Ngh!\d%K%P
All of a sudden my face was hit with warm cushiony\nfeeling.%K%P
It wasn't long before I realized she had pulled me\ninto her bosom.%K%P
\dYou know, I wish you would be more straightforward\nabout this, not just peek while I'm asleep.\d%K%P
\dYou know, when you look at me like that... It\nmakes me happy.\d%K%P
Hearing a woman like Kaede say that, with a hint of\nshyness in her voice, had my mind reeling.%K%P
\dUhh, Kaede... This is...\d%K%P
\dJ-Just enjoy it would you. They're yours, you\nknow.\d%K%P
\dD-Don't torture me like this, Kaede.\d%K%P
With her talking like that, I nearly lost myself.%K%P
I stayed there in her arms and she held me tight,\nneither of us speaking a word.%K%P
Her wonderful womanly scent, combined with the\nwarmth of her skin left me relaxed.%K%P
Was this a reaction to her motherly aura or\nsomething?%K%P
\d...Ngh...\d%K%P
\dKaede, you know, you don't need to do this if you\ndon't want to.\d%K%P
\dI-It's not like that! I w-want to hug you even\ntighter!\d%K%P
\dMghh!\d%K%P
Now this really was too much!%K%P
It was so tight now I could hardly breathe...%K%P
\dOh! A-Akira! You're...?!\d%K%P
\dNgh....mgh...!\d%K%P
I could vaguely make out her voice, I was slipping\naway.%K%P
Was it...too late...?%K%P
\dHmm? Akira? Akira?!\d%K%P
\dHow did I ever do this...?\d%K%P
Moments ago, I had nearly suffocated Akira... How\ndid I mess up so bad?%K%P
I was glad to try acting like my old self again,\nbut the more I did the harder it got.%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
I mumbled his name under my breath.%K%P
That alone was enough to send a rush of warmth\nthrough my body.%K%P
I wanted him to see more of me. To be enthralled\nwith me.%K%P
\dI suppose I truly do love him.\d%K%P
Saying as much aloud left me feeling quite abashed.%K%P
But more so, it stirred up something deep within\nme. Something I wanted Akira to be aware of.%K%P
\dI'll need to work harder if I truly expect him to,\nthough.\d%K%P
That declaration was as much to cheer myself up as\nit was to bolster my determination.%K%P
Today had been quite a day.%K%P
Kaede had been all over me in a way she hadn't been\nfor a long, long time.%K%P
And thanks to that Yukari pushed back harder than\never, making their quarrels worse.%K%P
I mean, I didn't hate days like today, but...%K%P
\dWas Kaede trying a little too hard?\d%K%P
Everything was moving so fast, I couldn't imagine\nit was easy for her. Maybe she was being too hasty.%K%P
\dWell, I guess worrying about it won't help.\d%K%P
This might have just been a one day thing anyway.%K%P
It was too soon to jump to conclusions.%K%P
But day in and day out, she kept it up. And it\nstarted to take a real toll on her.%K%P
I couldn't just let it go unmentioned, so I waited\nfor the right moment and pulled her aside.%K%P
\dKaede?\d%K%P
It had taken a few days for me to get this chance.%K%P
I spotted her heading outside alone, so I followed\nafter and called out to her.%K%P
\dAkira? What are you doing out here so late?\d%K%P
\dI could ask you the same question. Where are you\nheaded off to?\d%K%P
\dI just needed a breath of fresh air...\d%K%P
\dYeah, me too.\d%K%P
I walked over close to her and we both stood in\nsilence for some time.%K%P
What was on her mind?%K%P
I had no idea.%K%P
But that's exactly why I came out here. To find\nout.%K%P
\dYou know--\d%K%P
\dHm?\d%K%P
As soon as I spoke she turned to face me.%K%P
And so I looked right back at her.%K%P
\d...I actually wanted to talk with you.\d%K%P
\dWith me...?\d%K%P
\dSo, you've been acting a bit more like your old\nself lately, right? I was just wondering... why\nexactly...\d%K%P
I only asked because I was worried about her, but\nshe seemed to take it another way.%K%P
Her face froze for a moment before turning away.%K%P
\dWas I annoying...? I'm sorry if I was a bother to\nyou.\d%K%P
\dI won't ever do that again--\d%K%P
\dHey, stop! I never said I didn't like it!\d%K%P
\dI'm actually glad things are like they used to\nbe.\d%K%P
\dYou aren't just saying that are you...? No, your\nface is too serious for that.\d%K%P
\dI'm being serious. If anything, I should be the\none apologizing.\d%K%P
\dI should have been the one to close the gap\nbetween us.\d%K%P
I'd taken advantage of her goodwill and done\nnothing myself.%K%P
I felt pretty ashamed of that.%K%P
\dYou don't have to apologize for anything. You\nknow... You haven't changed a bit since the day we\nmet, have you?\d%K%P
\dIt was that unwavering kindness of yours that\nfreed me from my fate as a Tatarigami.\d%K%P
I had freed her?%K%P
\dTo me it seemed like one day you just weren't a\nTatarigami anymore. I didn't think I'd had anything\nto do with it.\d%K%P
\dCan I ask you how exactly were you freed from\nbeing a Tatarigami?\d%K%P
Kaede must have felt conflicted.%K%P
But it only took a moment for a look of\ndetermination to settle on her face.%K%P
\dWell... I kind of want you to know now.\d%K%P
\dThis might sound like a lot of complaining, so I'm\nsorry if it's hard to take, but bear with me.\d%K%P
Kaede started to share things with me that she'd\nnever spoken of to any other person.%K%P
\dEver since I came into existence I was a\nTatarigami. You knew that, right?\d%K%P
\dWell, yeah.\d%K%P
The Manase family was a long line of shrine\nstewards.%K%P
I knew that the family had worshiped, pacified, and\neven suppressed some other deities before I had\never met Kaede.%K%P
\dUp until the Descent of the Goddesses, all I could\ndo was observe the disasters my Jinriki caused.\d%K%P
\dBut then I took physical form and started living\nalongside humans. I was still a Tatarigami, but I\nwanted to be more like a normal Goddess.\d%K%P
That didn't seem quite right.%K%P
I mean, when she had first appeared, the city had\nfeared her so gravely it was considered taboo to\neven make contact with her.%K%P
If she really had tried to act more like a normal\nGoddess there's no way everyone would have trembled\nin fear of her.%K%P
\dYou're entirely right, you know. I didn't act like\na typical Goddess at all.\d%K%P
She read my mind and laughed dejectedly at herself.%K%P
\dOf course everyone was afraid of me.\d%K%P
\dThey feared me because I was a Tatarigami and\nenshrined me because of it too.\d%K%P
\dNo matter how hard I tried, as long as I remained\nthe way I was they would never change their views.\d%K%P
\dThose negative emotions drew out my own, and the\nTatari within me took over.\d%K%P
\dAs a result they feared me even more, and avoided\nme like the plague.\d%K%P
No matter how hard she might have tried to be\nnormal, none of us would have seen her that way.%K%P
That was the sad fate Kaede had been attached to.%K%P
\dBut even a lost cause of a Tatarigami like me was\nsaved in the end. Thanks to you, Akira.\d%K%P
\dSaved how...? All I did was treat you normally.\d%K%P
\dAnd that 'normal' treatment is exactly what no one\nelse could do for me.\d%K%P
\dYou treated me like any other girl, not as a\nTatarigami.\d%K%P
\dIt sounds simple, right?\d%K%P
\dBut you were the only human who wasn't consumed by\nfear at mere contact with me.\d%K%P
\dI was probably just oblivious to it all...\d%K%P
\dI don't think it was ignorance that saved me.\d%K%P
\dAnd look, you pulled off the festival and\neverything too.\d%K%P
It's true, it was quite a lot of her to have asked\nme to revive a long-dead festival.%K%P
But I had done it anyway.%K%P
All I had thought at the time was that I wanted to\nsee Kaede smile.%K%P
\dYou took the foolish desires of a Tatarigami to\nheart, and gave your everything to bring them to\nfruition.\d%K%P
\dBecause of that I was able to receive the\nSakimitama of so many people, and use them to\nescape my fate as a Tatarigami.\d%K%P
I'd never thought it was the festival that had\nturned Kaede into a normal Goddess.%K%P
\dI guess I at least helped out, then.\d%K%P
\dI wouldn't be here now if it weren't for you.\d%K%P
\dHow could I not fall for you after watching you go\nthrough all that?\d%K%P
Her face was bright red, but quickly turned dark.%K%P
\dI fell in love with you. I found myself wanting to\nbe with you always.\d%K%P
\dIt was only a matter of time before I took\nadvantage of that kindness of yours.\d%K%P
\dYou mean...that one time?\d%K%P
Our first time together had started with Kaede\ntaking the lead.%K%P
She had lain me down and clung to me with a face of\ninnocence.%K%P
\dYou always act responsibility, so I thought if I\ncould just get you started...\d%K%P
\dIf I could get you focused on me by being with\nyou, then...\d%K%P
\dI'm an awful Goddess, aren't I?\d%K%P
She spoke her mind as if filled with regret, and I\nthought back on that day.%K%P
\dKaede...\d%K%P
Her shoulders trembled at the sound of my voice.%K%P
\dWhen we did it that time, I was too embarrassed to\ntell you how I really felt. I regret that now.\d%K%P
I could have stopped her back then, if I'd wanted.%K%P
But I didn't.%K%P
Why was that?%K%P
\dI wanted to be with you that night.\d%K%P
\dI didn't just go through the motions.\d%K%P
\dThank you, Akira...\d%K%P
\dYou always try to make me feel better, even at\ntimes like this...\d%K%P
Her words irked me a little.%K%P
How could she not see I was telling the truth?%K%P
\dWhat can I do so you'll believe me?\d%K%P
\dWell... Show me some proof then. Heh...\d%K%P
\dFine.\d%K%P
\dWhat? A-Akira...!\d%K%P
I pulled her in for a kiss to make my point.%K%P
Taken by surprise Kaede's eyes opened wide. She\ntried to pull away, but I wrapped my arms around\nher.%K%P
\dNgh...\d *smooch* \dMmm...ha...\d *smooch*%K%P
\dAh, mmm, ngh...\d *smooch* \dHnnn...\d%K%P
Our lips pressed together, I greedily took her\nmouth to mine.%K%P
\dHaah... Ngh...ahhh...\d%K%P
\dWell? Do you believe me now?\d%K%P
We had to have kissed for more than a full minute,\nand it left her eyes narrowed and watery.%K%P
\dWhat would you do if I said it wasn't enough?\d%K%P
\dWell I'd kiss you until it was.\d%K%P
\dDo it then... I want more of you.\d%K%P
\dYour wish is my command.\d%K%P
Nothing else needed to be said. I continued to\nshower her with kisses.%K%P
*kiss, kiss*%K%P
\dMmm, nghh... A-Akira...\d%K%P
Her lips alone weren't enough for me, so I started\nusing my tongue.%K%P
She was startled for a moment, but didn't stop me.%K%P
\dMmm...\d *kiss*%K%P
*kiss, kiss*%K%P
Too many kisses to count.%K%P
Finally taken out of the moment, it was like I had\nalmost forgotten why I was even kissing Kaede in\nthe first place, I was just so enthralled.%K%P
I could have gone on forever, but we needed to stop\nsomewhere.%K%P
\dMmm...\d *kiss*%K%P
I finished off, licking her lips to leave my mark\nbefore pulling away.%K%P
\dHnnn... Akira...I believe you now.\d%K%P
\dAnd now I know how you feel, too.\d%K%P
\dSure took us a while, huh?\d%K%P
\dThe shortest paths aren't always the best. Maybe\nthis was the right thing for us.\d%K%P
\dYeah... Let's stay close from now on.\d%K%P
\dI couldn't ask for anything more.\d%K%P
It sure took us a while to make it here, but now\nKaede and I finally understood one another.%K%P
